title: Bug 118780 - Column alias not reflected in expression builder
EB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the first column name should be displayed using the alias name instead of the original name. However, currently, the original name of the first column is listed below the expression builder and the alias name appears as 'row["column1"]' above after double clicking the original name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Go to the expression builder.
2. Select a dataset from the available options.
3. Double click on the name of the first column.

Expected behavior:
The first column in the expression builder should use the alias name instead of the original name.

Observed behavior:
The original name of the first column is listed below the expression builder, and the alias name appears as 'row["column1"]' above after double clicking the original name.
